duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide therapy using holistic and traditional modalities for children, adolescents, adults, couples, and families.
Integrate mind-body connection care into mental health treatment for Chronic Stress, PTSD, and Anxiety.
Utilize available team support, training, materials, and resources to enhance treatment delivery.
Participate in optional monthly gatherings and group communication app to connect with the current team members.
Collaborate with other health businesses in the area to offer additional therapy, groups, workshops, and mind-body modalities.
Work with insurance providers and self-pay clients using available credentialing and billing services.
Participate in mind-body connection training paid for by Oak Mountain Therapy upon starting.
Bridge the gap between holistic and medical model modalities for comprehensive treatment.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Mental Health, Counseling, or related field
